name: fueltoco2e
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool carbonfootprint.
Tool description: Calculate the carbon footprint in various situations, such as travel and hydro usage.
API description: Transform liters of Diesel, Petrol or LPG into CO2 Equivalent in Kg.

type.description: The type of fuel. Valid values are 'Petrol', 'Diesel', 'LPG'.

litres.description: The number of liters of fuel to convert.
